ProjectTitle: Connecting morphosyntax and lexical semantics with Elastic Net regression
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/10/2022
Thank you for submitting your revised DMP. 
For data sharing please have a look if, in addition to github, KU Leuven RDR could be suitable (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).

08/07/2022
You submitted the data management information that is asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the project FWO asks a more elaborate data management plan. To write this you can use DMPonline KU Leuven (https://dmponline.kuleuven.be/), selecting the FWO template, here you can also find guidance. Alternatively, you can use the word template that you can find on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/). You can find more information on the RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
label: good with suggestions
